description: Shepherd metadata to describe a deployer or container deployed with shepherd.

kubeConfigB64.description: Base64 encoded tar gz with kubernetes deployment files.

lastCommits.description: Base64 encoded string with last relevant commits.

gitBranch.description: Branch in repository that image was build from

gitHash.description: Hash calculated from sources behind this deployer.

gitUrl.description: URL that was used to check out the sources to build the image

buildHostName.description: Name of host where this image was built.

dockerImageUrl.description: Full docker image URL with tag

dockerImageGithash.description: Full docker image with tag that is

migrationImage.description: Full docker image with tag for database migrations
